snippet: On the campaign trail, Mr. Cruz has been testing several strategies to dent Mr. Trump’s popularity. But true to form, Mr. Trump has complicated his path.
abstract: Sen Ted Cruz has been forced to abandon his tactic of ignoring his opponents in race for Republican presidential nomination as he tries to topple Donald Trump; Cruz has adopted more aggressive strategy, attempting to paint Trump as anathema to conservative values and to highlight more liberal positions Trump has held in past.

byline.original: By MATT FLEGENHEIMER and JONATHAN MARTIN

lead_paragraph: On the campaign trail, Mr. Cruz has been testing several strategies to dent Mr. Trump’s popularity. But true to form, Mr. Trump has complicated his path.

headline.main: Donald Trump Is Forcing Ted Cruz to Rewrite His Playbook
headline.print_headline: Trump Forcing Cruz’s Playbook to Be Rewritten
